sentence: Unilever NV ( UN ) will begin trading ex-dividend on May 07, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.3938 per share is scheduled to be paid on June 11, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased UN stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 7.77% increase over the prior quarter.
At the current stock price of $42.31, the dividend yield is 3.72%.
The previous trading day's last sale of UN was $42.31, representing a -1.58% decrease from the 52 week high of $42.99 and a 15.7% increase over the 52 week low of $36.57.
UN is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UN's forecasted earnings growth in 2014 as 2.35%, compared to an industry average of 3.3%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UN Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.

It also has the highest percent weighting of UN at 1.92%.
